string.name: newpollheader
string.value: Eine neue Umfrage für die Konferenz.

string.name: infomessage
string.value: Info: Jeder verbundene Benutzer erhält eine Nachricht mit der neuen Umfrage.

string.name: moderation
string.value: Sie müssen Moderator/Lehrer in diesem Raum sein um eine Umfrage anzulegen.

string.name: alreadyvoted
string.value: Sie haben für diese Umfrage bereits ihr Votum abgegeben.

string.name: nopoll
string.value: Es gibt zur Zeit keine Umfage.

string.name: modleave
string.value: Der Moderator/Lehrer dieses Raums hat den Raum verlassen.

string.name: reconeectneeded
string.value: Sie müssen sich erneut verbinden damit die Änderungen wirksam werden.

string.name: clearwhiteboardquestion
string.value: Soll dass Zeichenbrett geleert werden bevor ein neues Bild hinzugefügt wird?

string.name: needconfirmationwhiteboard
string.value: Bestätigung anfordern bevor das Zeichenbrett geleert wird.

string.name: applyMessage
string.value: A User wants to apply for moderation:

string.name: nonmoderrormessage
string.value: Sie sind nicht der Moderator dieser Konferenz!

string.name: roomfullmessage
string.value: This Room is full. Sorry please try again later.

string.name: min4username
string.value: Der Benutzername muss mindestens 4 Zeichen lang sein

string.name: min4pass
string.value: Das Passwort muss mindestens 4 Zeichen lang sein

string.name: emailtaken
string.value: Ein Fehler wurde geworfen bitte kontaktieren Sie das Admin Team

string.name: loadwml_confirmmess
string.value: Zeichnbrett leeren, alle bisherigen Änderungen gehen damit verloren!

string.name: loadwml_confirmmess2
string.value: Bestätigung anfordern vor dem Laden einer Datei

string.name: user_registerFalsePWDHeader
string.value: Bitte geben Sie zwei identische Passwörter mit mindestens 4 Buchstaben ein.

string.name: user_registerSuccessHeader
string.value: Ihr Benutzer wurde angelegt. Sie können sich nun einloggen.

string.name: user_sharing_message
string.value: Sie können ihren Bildschirm im Moment nicht veröffentlichen da bereits ein anderer Benutzer in diesem Conferenzraum es tut.

string.name: screen_warnBandwidth
string.value: Schlechte Bandbreite. Es war nicht möglich alle Bilder des Bildschirms zu laden. Tritt dieser Fehler häufiger auf können Sie den Moderator darum bitten die Qualität zur verringern.

string.name: organisation_usersalreadadded
string.value: Dieser Benutzer ist bereits Teil dieser Organisation.

string.name: loginwindow
string.value: Geben Sie bitte entweder eine EMail oder einen Login an.

string.name: loginwindow
string.value: There is no User connected to this Username

string.name: loginwindow
string.value: The email containing a special link has been sent to your email address, please check your mailbox. If you still have not received a email, please adjust your email spam settings and resend confirmation email.

string.name: resetpass
string.value: The Passwords you entered weren't identical.

string.name: resetpass
string.value: Password set. You can login now.

string.name: rpcgeneralerror
string.value: Unkown Error. Please report this to your Service-Team.

string.name: registration
string.value: duplicate filename, please choose another filename

string.name: useradmin
string.value: User added but you need to assign this User to an Organisation, otherwise he won't be able to sign-in.

string.name: languageseditor
string.value: No Field found with this FieldId.

string.name: languageseditor
string.value: No Label found for that Field.

string.name: languageseditor
string.value: You did only delete the Label NOT the Field! You cannot delete the Field, it may has Labels in other Languages.

string.name: languageseditor
string.value: Invalid Labelid. The FieldLanguagesvalues_Id cannot be found in the database.

string.name: languageseditor
string.value: You cannot delete this Field. You can only delete Labels NOT Fields. There is no Label loaded at the moment, wether it is not selected any Field or there is no Label for this Language for that Field defined.

string.name: languageseditor
string.value: You need to logout to see any changes.

string.name: backuppanel
string.value: All organisations must be already existing!

string.name: languageseditor
string.value: Export to XML - These files can be used to: - Contribute to the project - Import into another System - Backup - Customization - Put it into the language-directory for your next installation

string.name: languageseditor
string.value: Choose a language file to import. Choose the right Langauge from the Combobox! No matter what the name of the file is, it will be imported into this language!

string.name: record
string.value: Recordings of public and private Rooms

string.value: This Room is Full. Try again in a few minutes.

string.value: click on a room to get details

string.name: roomslist
string.value: Chat with the users in this Room:

string.name: record
string.value: Recorder Mode! You cannot change any values, this is a recorded File!

string.name: record_error_msg
string.value: There is already somebody recording at the moment:

string.name: record_cancal_tooltip
string.value: Recording will be canceled and not saved.

string.name: cancel_dialog_resume_tooltip
string.value: Close this window and resume recording

string.name: choose_video_settings_info_text
string.value: No Audio/Video from your PC will be published, instead of that a picture from your profile will be shown. Choose these settings if you have problems with your bandwidth or a very slow Internet connection.

string.name: moderator_gone_message
string.value: Der Moderator hat den Raum verlassen. Sie müssen die Moderation beantragen wenn Sie auf das Zeichenbrett zeichnen wollen.

string.name: moderator_message_event_no_mod
string.value: Es gibt momentan keinen Moderator in diesen Raum. Sie müssen die Moderation beantragen oder warten.

string.value: Klicken Sie auf diesen Link um in den Raum zu gelangen:

string.value: wenn der Link fehlerhaft dargestellt wird, kopieren sie bitte folgenden Link in die Adresszeile ihres Browsers:

string.value: Klicken Sie hier um ein neues Passwort einzugeben:

string.value: wenn der Link fehlerhaft dargestellt wird, kopieren sie bitte folgenden Link in die Adresszeile ihres Browsers:

string.name: dateRegExpError
string.value: Please enter a valid Date, for example 24.12.2001 (dd.mm.yyyy)

string.name: emailRegExpError
string.value: Please enter a valid EMail, for example name@mail.com

string.name: floatRegExpError
string.value: Please enter a Float-Number, for example 1.00

string.name: numberRegExpError
string.value: Please enter a Number (Integer), for example 100

string.name: phoneRegExpError
string.value: Please enter a valid Phone number, for example ++49 0123 123123

string.name: timeRegExpError
string.value: Please enter a valid time, for example 12:23 (hh:mm)

string.name: invitation_error
string.value: Not Invitation availible for this Invitation-Code

string.name: invitation_error
string.value: The Invitation was already used. This type of Invitation cannot be re-used.

string.name: errorCode_invalidSession
string.value: Login was correct, but the Session you tried is not active or stored on the Server. You have to get a new SessionId and retry login.

string.name: errorcode_setUserObject
string.value: The SessionId is not loggedin or has no Admin rights. The SOAP Gateway needs an User with Admin-Rights to embed new Users.

string.name: errorcode_loginByRemoteUser
string.value: This Session has no Remoteuser-Data connected. Wether you did not call the SOAP-Gateway before accessing the Application or you are usnig a wrong Session-ID

string.name: connectionLostMessage
string.value: The Connection to the Server is lost. You need to reload the Application or/and check your Network.
Activate this if you write in a right to left language (inverse word order)

string.name: tooltip main-menu
string.value:
Meeting - Make a conference with 4 (up to 16) Users
everybody will have audio + video access

string.name: tooltip main-menu
string.value:
Event - Make a conference with up to 200 participents
Only the Moderator will have audio/video

string.name: tooltip main-menu
string.value:
Create users, rooms, organizations
+ change configuration

string.value: Loading Document. Please wait untill all Client have been synchronized.

string.name: upload dialog
string.value: Upload and Import Dialog. Please select a File from your Disk.

string.name: kick user confirmation dialog
string.value:
Do you really want to kick this Client from the Connection?
This does only remove the Client from the current Room.The Client could re-login again.

string.name: kick user message dialog
string.value: Your session has been closed by an Administrator or Moderator.
